NORTH ATLANTIC.
SENEGAL TO SAINT LUCIA.
34 FOOT S/V AMATHEIA, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
OVERDUE CAP VERT (14-44N 017-31W) TO
SAINT LUCIA (13-53N 060-58W). LAST KNOWN POSITION
IN 16-24N 040-46W ON 02 DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
